lead_paragraph: CHARNEY--Leon. Olshan Frome Wolosky LLP through attorneys Warren R. Gleicher, Lawrence N. Friedland and Thomas J. Fleming, deeply mourn the loss of our esteemed client and friend Leon H. Charney who died on March 21, 2016 at age 77 and send heartfelt condolences to his family. Leon was a leader in the real estate industry, philanthropist who supported Jewish and medical causes, peace broker, cantor, author, television talk show host and a great lover of Israel and advisor to Israeli officials. Leon was a true renaissance man and a gentleman of the highest order and will be greatly missed. 1/3
